name: Fotobubbles
overview:
Fotobubbles is a unique, photography based media generation company that offers premium wedding services (Under the brand of FotoShaadi.com) to the ever growing Wedding industry in India. Services include photo-journalistic candid photography, off location fashion shoots, photobooth for on-spot printing, growing up, pre and post marriage videos and many more. Only company in India to offer a first-of-its-kind full 360 degrees panoramic photography service for weddings.

In its first six months of operation, FotoShaadi has booked over 50 weddings around India. Started by experienced technologists, extensive amount of research and processes are put in place in making the offerings more robust and standard. Vision is to become a one-stop shop for all media needs of the wedding industry.

Fotobubbles also helps showcase establishments like hotels, institutes, industries etc in a variety of mediums through customized and concept based services.
